en.courseTitle: AI Course - Generative, Agentic and Energy
en.authorBio: Independent consultant with 20+ years in cloud infrastructure and AI. I've witnessed the evolution from when 'cloud' just meant weather and 'AI' was pure sci-fi. Now I help companies navigate the hype (and actually build things that work).
en.chaptersIntro: A complete journey from 1950s AI (when 64KB RAM was massive) to modern LLMs consuming more energy than Portugal. History, technical fundamentals, Python, embeddings, RAG, agentic systems. Real numbers, working code examples, zero marketing fluff.
en.guidesIntro: Step-by-step guides to learn the technologies under the hood. Because understanding how AI actually works beats just knowing how to call an API.
